summary.body: I saw that in today's CityAM paper that Wallside has been featured following the buyout of the lease from the Corporation of London (or whatever they are now) to freehold. According to some this adds 30K to this type of property. Mind you they have a valuation of between 1m and 1.2m
summary.subject: Leasehold

summary.body: One page flier advertising a one evening consultation meeting posted through Speed House doors today.  Private company to build the flats and sell them but not clear if the freehold will remain with corporation.
summary.subject: Frobisher crescent to be turned in to flats
